T02TD3572E:203a-1: aashta bhu dza ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02TD3572E:203a-3: rigs byed ma phyag brgyad ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3572E:203a-4: rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3572E:203a-5: sngon du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa bsgoms nas ram yi g-yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma la hr'i:yig spro ba dang bsdu pa'i skur bsgoms nas /
T02TD3572E:203a-6: de yongs su gyur pa las skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kulle phyag brgyad ma /
T02TD3572E:203a-7: sku mdog dmar mo padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-0: nyi ma la rdo rje skyil @203b krung gis bzhugs pa gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gnas shing phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-1: g-yas kyis phyag lhag ma rnams kyis lcags kyu dang rna pa'i rtsar mda' 'gengs pa dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-2: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya bsnams pa'o//
T02TD3572E:203b-3: g-yon gyi phyag lhag ma rnams kyis zhags pa dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-7: shar gyi 'dab mar rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-8: lho'i 'dab mar rdzogs pa'i sgrol ma'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-9: nub kyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'i sgrol ma'o//
T02TD3572E:203b-10: byang gi 'dab mar rna ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-11: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tsunda'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-12: me'i 'dab ma la gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-13: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la mar me'i sgrol ma'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-14: rlung gi 'dab ma la goo r'i'i sgrol ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-15: de rnams thams cad kyang sku mdog ser mo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-16: phyag g-yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-18: phyag g-yon pa dag gi sa autpal dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-20: shar gyi sgor rdo rje ro langs ma 'jigs shing lto ba'i phyang ba sku mdog dmar mo mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD3572E:203b-21: phyag g-yas pa dag gis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-23: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-24: lho'i sgor gzhan gyis mi thub ma sku mdog ser mo rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD3572E:203b-25: phyag g-yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang /
T02TD3572E:203b-27: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3572E:203b-28: nub kyi sgor ral pa gcig ma mdog nag mo skra gyen du brdzes shing lto ba 'phyang ba //
T02TD3572E:203b-29: mche ba gtsigs shing mchu bsdams pa /
T02TD3572E:203b-30: 'do dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD3572E:203b-31: phyag g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02TD3572E:203b-32: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3572E:204a-0: byang sgor rdo rje gandha r'i sku mdog gser ljang gu lta bu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa zhal @204a * //
T02TD3572E:204a-2: phyag g-yas pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD3572E:204a-4: phyag g-yon ga dag gis dral bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3572E:204a-5: bzhi po 'di rnams zhags g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02TD3572E:204a-6: de la 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar nas ming gnyis mdud pa byas pa ste //
T02TD3572E:204a-7: mthe'u chung dang gung mo mthe ba chen gyis bsdams nas mdzub mo lcags kyu'i rnam pas 'gying zhing dpral ba'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD3572E:204a-8: bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3572E:204a-9: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02TD3572E:204a-10: khri bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3572E:204a-13: autpal la mar dang sbrang bsres shing aa shvadtha'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas pas 'dod pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3572E:204a-14: dpal gyi 'bras bu'i shing gis me rab tu sbar te /
T02TD3572E:204a-15: mar dang sbrang la bsgres shing dpal gyi 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas pas rgyal po dang blon po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3572E:204a-16: autpal la'i sbyin sreg stong byas te mar gyi mar me stong phrag gcig lha mo'i mdun du dbul bar byas na rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3572E:204a-17: ku ru kulle phyag brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs rgyal po aindra bh'u ti'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
